reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a very good tablet and its nice for kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This tablet arrived today (the day before Thanksgiving), and it will be returned on Friday (the day after Thanksgiving). I can't use it. The size is exactly what I was looking for -- larger than a cell phone, but not TOO large. The fact that it comes with a folding cover and appears to even have a screen protector pre-installed is great. BUT ... the operating system is Android Go Edition, which doesn't work like the regular Android operating system. The home screen has an annoyingly busy wallpaper which is impossible to shut off. There are a number of apps pre-installed that cannot be removed or disabled. But the worst is that I bought this tablet specifically to run ONE particular app -- and the crippled version of Playstore that you get with Go Edition doesn't ever allow me to install the app I want to run. In fact, it doesn't even show the app when I search for it by name. Considering that the app runs on cell phones that are older than this tablet and running much older versions of Android, that's inexcusable.This tablet appears to be intended for use by children, not by adults who live in the real world.Very disappointed.Update: My rating has been reduced from 2 stars to 1 star. I replaced this piece of junk with a USED Samsung Tab A6, from 2016, that runs Android version 5.11 -- and that runs the app I needed. Why this much newer tablet, with more RAM and more storage capacity won't allow me to install it is a mystery. It's because the operating system is Android GO Edition, not the real Android 11.Avoid this device like the plague. It won't make you happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for kids~ packed with features
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this Android tablet for my ten year old for our long distance road trip. It really helped us have a calm ride. We started with attaching it to the passenger seat’s headrest to play a movie. The picture quality is great and the internal drive was more than enough to download a few good movies. The audio quality was crisp and clear. Once we the parents didn’t want to listen anymore, he was able to connect his headphones easily. One of the really cool features was the dual camera which allowed him to take photos and conduct a video call simultaneously with his friends. I was glad to see that it came with an extra protective case.We are very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Review for Pink Tablet
reviews.reviewText: Tends to run slow. Touch screen is not very sensitive usually have to click several times before it takes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery Doesn't Last
reviews.reviewText: I've had this tablet for about 10 months, it was perfect for reading and simple games. At first the battery would last 6-8 days. Now it doesn't want to stay charged more than 1-2 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought device for little sister to watch videos on. Tablets left overnight to charge, at 5 percent in the morning, no use. Device corrupted and won't load/start and it's only used for to watch videos on yt.Tablets are on go edition and not android 11

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Slow Running Tablet
reviews.reviewText: This tablet is nice and the screen output is decent, but its smaller size makes it more appropriately geared for little hands, such as for kids. My biggest issue is the delay you experience when running most basic games. Lags a lot, freezes up and even bumps you right out of a game. I am sending this one back and I've only had it for less than a day.
